trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"> </xref> eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName>evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem>creando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised when `DataBind` is called on the item during a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName>evento viene generato quando `DataBind` per l'elemento viene chiamato durante una chiamata a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.CreateControlHierarchy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> object as the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItemEventArgs"> </xref> (classe), l'impostazione specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"> </xref> come origine dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
Gets the node item that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento del nodo che rappresenta l'origine dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> that is the source of the event.
